body: Don't know if this is an old scan or someone had a vintage volume of kairakuten laying around. Impressive.
Love the Range Murata cover and his pin up in the color pages.

Wow, now this is a history lesson. Seeing the difference in drawing trends of the late 90's versus today, and the page layouts are very straightforward and simple. I don't recognize most of these artists except Karma (Karuma) Tatsurou. Holy shit, been doing this for 20+ years, huh?
